projectGridLines.title: In description
projectGridLines.description:
We aim to build LLM that can enable us to solve extraction, interpretation, and reasoning with trade documents. This project consists of input prompt design, image data preparation, and LLM code development and training at scale. Finally, there will be code development needed for fast inferencing.

For this project, we need someone who will develop various prompt design methods, such as few-shot learning, mathematical Q&A, multi-modal prompts, Automatic Reasoning and Tool Use (ART), and Prompt Chaining. Additionally, for model training, we require support in developing scalable framework.
